reviews.review:
Counter Strike has set the bar for future shooters from the day it was released to today. Many modern day games have used similar maps, and formats as this great game. For someone like me, this is the game that got me into gaming or the game of all games I might say. Underneath all the blood, grenades, and bullets flying is a beautiful ground breaking fps of its time that people still choose to play over modern day games.
It gives you everything you want in a "realistic" shooter without all the unnecessary crap like jet packs, martyr nades and juggernauts. Feel rewarded watching your skill grow and not just getting better based on unlocks. After being a gamer for going on 20+ years now I can confidently say that no game is going to give you the kind of rush that Counter-Strike will to this day. And no game has kept the realism that players desire like this game has. Great game, great servers, and great people. If you haven't played CS:S what are you waiting for?

eu sei que literalmente ninguém me perguntou mas esse jogo é brabo, bots espertos (me dao um pau no easy, não que eu seja bom),mapas pra caramba, jogo mais bonito que o cs go (source:jogo de 2004 go:2013 morra valve morra), e é simplesmente divertido, sem foco em competitividade e nem em arrancar seu dinheiro e sua sanidade que nem o go, mas sim pra você se divertir, jogo gostosinho de mais. Toda essa análise até agora foi só em base do singleplayer/server privado com amigos, os servers públicos meu amigo... não sei definir se é o céu ou o inferno, cariocas de 43 anos com o nome de BOLSOMITO_PETRALHASLAYER dando rage, criança sendo bulinada, admin banindo quem joga bem, uns plugin bizarro (paraquedas????) spray de player pra confundir o outro time, mapa ruim pra caralho, sertanejo tocando no final de todo round, skin do time adversário pra confundir os player, simplesmente..algo...algo entre o céu e o inferno.....a terra. Os servers públicos representam o humano em suaais pura forma,apenas lindo. Recomendo.
Für das alter extrem geil hat sogar mehr modis als csgo Lohnt sich meines wissens her.
the crosshair customization and the grafics

In my opinion? Pretty good game. Fun with friends, not as dead as the other Source upgrades of multiplayer Half-Life mods (like DoD:S and Deathmatch Source).

Community servers are full of tryhard AWP users nowadays tho, but you'll still find a cool lobby every once in a while. 
My only problem is the amount of lame grinding achievements, but that's not enough to change my mind about the game. Anyway, 7/10 would crush Dust2 matches with TMP killstreaks again
